features.name: FileUpload
features.description: Drag-and-drop file upload component with 25MB limit and validation.

features.name: StemPlayer
features.description: Audio player for individual stems (vocals, drums, bass, other) with volume and seek controls.

features.name: WaveformVisualizer
features.description: Canvas-based waveform visualization synchronized with audio playback.

features.name: ProcessDashboard
features.description: Dashboard showing real-time processing status of audio separation.

features.name: ResultsPage
features.description: Grid layout of stemmed audio players with download capabilities.
